website_summaries.verdict: A popular, top-selling iced tea for good reason – it has tea taste consumers love and comes in varieties to suit almost any preference.
pros: Brewed from real tea leaves prior to bottling for balanced tea flavor
Available in several flavor options including lemon, black tea, raspberry, sweetened, and unsweetened
cons: A few repeat customers complain of batches with off flavor
Sweet black tea flavor may be too sweet for some customers

customer_reviews.title: Great Tea at a very high price.
customer_reviews.text: In love with this tea- I’ve purchased it 4x’s already, just went back to purchase again and the price went from under $9 to over $17!!!! What?! Love it, but not at that price. Sheesh.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but not comfortable with robbery.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves the tea. Bought it last time for under $9 for a 12-pack, now it is same amount for $18. Are you kidding? Must be made in China and hit by tariffs...NOT! Convenient but not comfortable with robbery. Headed to Walmart up the street.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J

customer_reviews.title: The price change is ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: This tea is awesome. I love it. However, I ordered this last week and it was under $9. Now it is $18. This is RIDICULOUS.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Expired tea and disappointed customer
customer_reviews.text: I WAS happy with my purchase and delivery till this morning when I took a drink... I have never had a bad or off tasting pure leaf tea which is why I only buy this brand. This morning I opened one and took a big sip and had to check the label cause it did not taste like sweet tea, its expired! The whole case is expired! I'm extremely disappointed now, at the very least when I expected to not receive expired product on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy K

customer_reviews.title: Expiration Date
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered to my house on October 3, 2018! Check our the expiration date! October 1, 2018!
customer_reviews.author: Christina S

customer_reviews.title: Will expire too soon
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and a good bargain. Fine. But the expiration date says it's not good after Jan 15, 2019. But I'm REALLY disappointed. i won't order this again. I expected much better than this. Had to give most of it away before it went bad. The only upside is that when I gave it away, I wouldn't give it to a greedy neighbor who expects everything for free. I gave to a few good friends instead at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: Grouchbag

customer_reviews.title: Almost expired every time...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and it's twice as cheap here than in stores... but after 6 orders over 2 years it's getting kind of old (pun) to receive these a month before they expire. Tea like this is probably good for a year so it sits around somewhere and then goes on sale on Amazon and that's what we get. Sept 2019 update- It's not even worth buying anymore at 15-17$ vs. the 8-9$ it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Travis G.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but damaged on delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great tea but packaging was horrendous. One of the teas was damaged and empty causing the other bottles to be sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Why did the price more than double?
customer_reviews.text: Great value - until the price more than doubled. Current price prevents any future purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Best Ice Tea I Have ever Tasted and With 0 Calories you Can't Go Wrong, Green Tea Is Also Just as Good
customer_reviews.text: Best Ice Tea I have ever tasted hands down. I'm not one who likes sweet and lemon tasting Ice teas and the Pure Leaf Gets it perfect. Plus there are 0 Calories! I drink at least 2 of these a day. The Pure Leaf Green Tea is a also very good. Will continue to purchase this Ice Tea for the foreseeable future. BTW, I ordered this twice using my new Amazon Dot and Alexa found the item I asked her to search for and it was easy to place my order.
customer_reviews.author: M. Petruccelli

customer_reviews.title: GREED Plain and Simple
customer_reviews.text: Three weeks I bought this product for 1/2 the price . Stop gouging people.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Priced way too high now
customer_reviews.text: Great Tea but the price increase is now too much and not a good value going to have to go to the grocery store and buy it because now it’s cheaper there
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Stop raising the price!!
customer_reviews.text: The tea is great!! The way Amazon keeps raising the price is ridiculous. I was puchasing every week. I will no longer purchase at $18.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Shields

customer_reviews.title: Price going UP, UP, UP.
customer_reviews.text: I was going to give this one star but decided on two because I think it is a good product. Went to reorder and found out the price has doubled. What genius marketeer at PureLeaf/Lipton/PepsiCo decided they can get people to pay $18 for a 12-pack of tea? I can only hope that they are proved wrong and lower their price. Too bad, like I said good brewed tea.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great tea gone wrong
customer_reviews.text: 4 out of the 12 bottles had a slime like substance floating in the neck of the bottles! Each bottle smelled off, not like tea. I took pictures of the substance in the bottles and when I poured it in my white sink. It was nasty. Please whenever you buy this product check each bottle for the cloudy substance and acrid smell and do not serve it!!!
customer_reviews.author: SACIEW

customer_reviews.title: More than doubled in price!
customer_reviews.text: Was a great buy at 7 bucks but it’s more than doubled in price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K.

customer_reviews.title: Way too acidic and also always alsmost expired
customer_reviews.text: I measured pH of this tea with a freshly calibrated pH Meter pH 55 Milwaukee and it reads 4.0. Way too acidic and therefore not good for enamel. This is much more acidic than tea I brew myself because I don't add citric acid to my tea. This is enough for 1 star rating, but in addition the few times I ordered it arrived almost expired with 1-2 months of expiration.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Did an employee drink one of these? Makes me a little nervous. Did someone tamper with them?
customer_reviews.text: I love Pure Leaf's product. I'm not extremely happy with the way my product showed up though. That's why it's getting 4 stars not 5. Looks like someone helped themselves, then used the open case it to fill my order. Kind of unprofessional, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Icecreamcherie

customer_reviews.title: Mold growth has become big issue, don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: For some reason about 4 bottles in every case has mold growing in it. It's easy to see as its whitish and floats at the top but 4 bottles out of 12 is a lot to lose. This seems to be a pretty regular occurrence add well (my last 5 cases have had these bad bottles) and in today's times I can't afford to lose a third of every case so I'll be looking for other tea to drink. Company really needs to figure our this problem as an unsuspecting person might accidently drink and get veri ill or even die.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Honey Green Tea-Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe I have used this brand of tea before.I just got my 12 pack today for Honey Green Tea 12 pack and had my first drink of it. Pretty much all I tasted was Stevia instead of sugar. I can't stand the bitter taste to it. I was going to send it back but my husband said the postage would cost too much; and so I will see if someone else will will take it. It upset my stomach as it does have that chemical taste of Stevia. I don't recommend this particular flavor. I knew I should have tried the unsweetened version.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to look for mold
customer_reviews.text: The tea came and it was molded. The package looked like it had some dust on it, so I rinsed off each tea under hot water. I took one to drink and it smelled like beer and tasted a little like beer. I first googled to see different effects for the smell and taste, but it didn’t have any vanilla extract in it. So I went to Amazon to see other people review and others have the same issue as I have. The expiration date says March 23, 2020 but it has floating stuff in it that is probably mold. Like half the tea was molded and the other half wasn’t, but I don’t want to take the risk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price more than doubled!
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this tea for over a year and love it. Will never buy it again at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Barker

customer_reviews.title: Stopped buying after price gouging
customer_reviews.text: They had a pretty reasonable price and then they doubled it because it's summer now. I will refuse to buy this and just drink tap water.
customer_reviews.author: Marcho

customer_reviews.title: Price doubled overnight
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price, but not since the price doubled overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L. Hoffmann jr.

customer_reviews.title: Expired, like many other reviewers
customer_reviews.text: We like this tea in our house. We actually usually brew it ourselves, but the loose tea suddenly became impossible to find. The price was good on these 12-packs so I picked up two to tide us over. Only after I cracked one open did I notice the expiration date of 12/17/2018 for a product I ordered on 1/16/2019. I guess I now know why the price was so good. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Pure Leaf Teas are Pure Joy....!
customer_reviews.text: These teas are simply the best - period! Great taste and zero sweetener. The Black teas are awesome too, but these Green ones are even better. AND - they are actually straight-up brewed - NOT some mix or reconstituted like other brands. Some will say real brew, but then they are made into a powder for storage and longevity - then re-hydralized later (yes - I just made up that word....??) Anyway, Pure Leaf are 100% directly brewed and bottled. Plus, getting them on Amazon, you can find prices waaay better than in stores. I have tried just about every unsweetened tea on the market, and none compare to Pure Leaf. Don't waste your taste buds on inferior brands yo....
customer_reviews.author: Traiby

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but what happened to the price?!?!?!
customer_reviews.text: I used to purchase this in droves at around $9 per case. The price has suddenly doubled to $18?!?!? What happened? I will not be buying this from Amazon anymore ... until the price returns to a reasonable amount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Iced Tea!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST Tea in a bottle, EVER!! So much better for Everyone!! Iced Tea isn't only for summer! Super Great price, So Fast and now Delivered to our door!!! Flavors for All tastes!! Pure Tea is Our Only Choice, Great for "grab & go" too!! So much better then fussing over caffeine loaded, sugary drinks! PURE LEAF TEA's!!
customer_reviews.author: Angeliza

customer_reviews.title: Great tea, not so much package
customer_reviews.text: Box came beat up and bottles were broken out of package inside
customer_reviews.author: Mimi HP

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, the best tea
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea. No acid, no tannins that make it bitter. Smooth, black tea. I used to buy Trader Joe's Unsweetened Tea, but I like this just as well if not a little better. I also used to by Teavana because that's what COSTCO carries, and I was fine with that -- until I tried Pure Leaf. Now, I can't go back. Best tea out there
customer_reviews.author: Krykie

customer_reviews.title: What a price hike!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy a couple of cases a month...then they doubled the price! I’ll be brewing my own tea now.
customer_reviews.author: Ddub

customer_reviews.title: Best bottle Tea on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this by accident. Meant to buy the Unsweet Lemon Black Tea, but it's still awesome. I started buying the unsweet lemon tea because it was the first brand I've come across that made unsweet lemon tea. Turns out it is really great even without the lemon. Of course, I've just added my own lemon to it, but the tea itself is as good as I've had premade store bought. Usually, most of the store teas taste like old tea. This is the exception. If you looking for a good store bought tea this has to be right up there with the best of them. If their premade stuff is this good, I'm curious to try their tea bags.
customer_reviews.author: Cisco680

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste, Expired
customer_reviews.text: update:i would give a zero star if I could. I just read the label on the box, and it says best by Oct 28,2019. I purchased on Sep 4,2019. Less than two months. It’s good looking, but very bad taste. It has very minimum tea taste, but taste like water with a little bit weird sour.
customer_reviews.author: angelina

customer_reviews.title: Great tea
customer_reviews.text: If you like sweet tea you will love this one it says extra sweet tea you might think it’s really sweet but it’s not I have had both sweet tea and this one I like this one best I poured it over ice and it was good if it’s to sweet for you put a slice or two of lemon but I don’t think you will need the lemon unless it’s for taste
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: According to a consumer scientific website, this tea contains a decent amount of cancer fighting polyphenols and has little contaminants in it. The flavor is consistent from batch to batch. Although the flavor is not that exciting being that it's unsweetened, you can easily add your favorite sweetener, sugar or artificial sweetener, to liven things up. I use erythritol. The bottles are sturdy and arrived with no damage or leakage. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: H_Swd

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Tea
customer_reviews.text: I just love this tea. I alternate between the extra sweet and the sweet tea. My tea has never been outdated or had any other problems. The tea always arrived in a timely manner but the packaging leaves much to be desired. The tea is too heavy to place 3 twelve packs in one box which is what Amazon has done in the past. The boxes have split or popped open. I have ordered this tea over 12 times, ordering at least 4 twelve packs at a time My only Issue is the price, which goes up and down on a regular.
customer_reviews.author: D. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Did not enjoy these one bit.
customer_reviews.text: (Unsweet Green) - I absolutely love several of the Pure Leaf Teahouse Tea's such as the Fuji Apple and Ginger, Sicilian Lemon and Honeysuckle, etc... But you can't buy those in bulk. So I thought I'd try to get some green tea and add my own flavoring. Bad idea. To me, this Green Tea tasted like Grass. I don't know how else to explain it. It was as off-putting as moldy black tea, and no amount of additives seemed to temper it. I definitely will not be buying that flavor again.
customer_reviews.author: Bardo

customer_reviews.title: Delicious at a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sweet ice tea at a great price! So happy I purchased the 12 pack. The extra sweet Pure Leaf Bottle Tea has become very popular in my area, and often hard to find. Sometimes I can only find one or two bottles in the stores, but many bottles of the other Pure Leaf flavors. I drink this tea everyday, which is why I prefer to buy a six pack at least. Very good flavor with just the right amount of natural sweetness that doesn’t taste like artificial sweetener. Also, the expiration date on this 12 pack is March 2021. I will definitely purchase this 12 pack again very soon!
customer_reviews.author: CCH

customer_reviews.title: Great Green Tea Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this is unsweetened green tea without extra flavoring added like so many other green tea have, such as citrus, fruit, etc. Sometimes I feel like enjoying the flavor of straight green tea. I do add my own sweetener so I can control the sweetness of it myself. I simply add it, put the top back on, shake it up and then pour it over ice. If I want, I can add my own fruit for an extra pop of flavor.
customer_reviews.author: SoftwareDiva

customer_reviews.title: Worst flavor ever!  (Unsweetened Mango Hibiscus)
customer_reviews.text: Words cannot describe how bad this flavor tastes. I love the mango hibiscus, but I don’t love all the calories, so I thought I’d get the unsweetened version hoping for it to at least taste somewhat like mango Hibiscus... But it doesn’t...not even close. I really can’t explain what this tastes like, other than I don’t think you’re gonna like it if you like mango Hibiscus. But if you like bitter, nearly undrinkable things, go for it. By the way, mixing this with the regular mango hibiscus ruins the sweet mango hibiscus and makes it taste just as bad as the unsweetened version. Not a good purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal ETop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: tasty
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was fast and excellent. The Raspberry tea is soooo refreshing. Love the nice cool taste. Once I share it. With my friends. They want it try it to. It quences one thirst. The other teas are great to. But don't compare to the raspberry tea. It is the best. Just try it and you will agree.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Eisenhauer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when mixed with Pure Leaf Unsweetened.
customer_reviews.text: Since another company discontinued it's Peach Iced Tea, I decided to try the Pure Leaf. It is a little too sweet for my taste but I found the PERFECT solution. In a liter bottle, pour one of the 18.5 oz Peach Tea bottles in. Top off with Pure Leaf Unsweetened Black Tea. It tastes of Peach but less sweet. It is now my go-to combination. Very tasty. Less sugar per portion.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brachman

customer_reviews.title: Very Delicious
customer_reviews.text: When I first ordered these I was a little unsure due to the flavors. My first taste I was blown as it was very delicious. I will admit it taste less like a tea but rather a fruit punch drink. You can definitely taste the notes of cherry and something else, which I am guessing is the hibiscus. but again it's very delicious. I will defiantly purchase more as they are caffeine free.
customer_reviews.author: Chog

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find this on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I found this tea in the supermarket several months ago. However, it soon was not to be found anywhere. I was relieved to find it on Amazon for a good price. Although I usually drink unsweetened tea, the honey adds flavor to the green tea. A little sweeter than I like, but refreshing and low enough in calories. It was delivered promptly.
customer_reviews.author: GramG

customer_reviews.title: Rare to find unsweetened green tea
customer_reviews.text: I avoid sugar but like tea. Green tea is mild and great for your health so I buy this so I can drink something other than water. The unsweetened green tea costs more when I buy it at the grocery store than here online and most of the time they don't have it at the store. I realize the unsweetened green tea may cost more that some of the other tea products but I am willing to pay to get the unsweetened version without having to make it at home. The green tea has less caffeine than black tea but it does have some and I like the health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Sandii

customer_reviews.title: Best Green Tea
customer_reviews.text: I really do not like green tea as I prefer black tea, but this green tea really stands out from other green tea's_ Ironically, I do not like their Black Tea, as I prefer to make my own_ I've tried 5 different brands to make my own taste like Pure LeafTM Green Tea and nothing comes close_ I can't understand what is making there's taste so much better than homemade_ Definitely this is the Best Unsweet Green Tea I've ever tasted_ I have a monthly subscription to save a few bucks over the year
customer_reviews.author: Guy Mangotree

customer_reviews.title: All the tea you'll need
customer_reviews.text: A good tea is something to talk about and pure leaf makes good tea. The basic flavors are good (sweet, extra sweet, unsweetened, raspberry). I would grab some once a month at the store. Stopped at a gas station and the attendant was complaining about stocking this one flavor so often. Mango hibiscus. I said let me give that a try. Have not touch another tea since. And that was three months ago. It is smooth and refreshing. My only complaint would be the price online. Can get a 6 pack for $6 (including tax) $18 is a little high
customer_reviews.author: marques leonard

customer_reviews.title: Pure Leaf Unsweetened is Great for Keto!
customer_reviews.text: Being on a keto diet, you need to find fun drinks that are not loaded with sugar. The Pure Leaf unsweetened teas (black and green) are sometimes hard to find at retail. This was a great alternative way to get a 12 pack shipped directly home. No more hassle of carrying heavy items and the cost was better than at brick & mortar. Thanks Amazon! As for Pure Leaf, please look at doing more unsweetened flavors. Many of us can't use artificial or non-sugar sweeteners (allergies or don't like the taste) and once you are accustomed to no sugar added, its hard to drink anything that is loaded with sweetness. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Ward

customer_reviews.title: Product expired
customer_reviews.text: Had a weird tast, checked the expiration date and it is December 17th 2018. Just wanted To get order replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kizer

customer_reviews.title: This has to be the BEST TEA in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: In my own opinion, when they started putting ice tea in cans and bottles, no thank you. I started to drink Pure Leaf (and even some of the flavors) I love the sweet Tea the best! I am so sorry for anyone in the past that had a short experience with the date on their tea, but this is July 26, 2020 and my case is good until December 2020. Ya Right like its even going to make it two weeks in my house. IN FLORIDA AND SELF QUARANTINING drinking my ice tea in my spa! 🥃🍉🍍😁
customer_reviews.author: DSKYLINE

customer_reviews.title: ***Love, love, love***
customer_reviews.text: I love this flavor! Love that it's caffeine free. Love that it's unsweetened so I can add my sweetener of choice and stay on a Keto diet. I was buying it in my local Dollar General and occasionally in the grocery store. Suddenly, I couldn't get it anywhere - and this just as my husband tried it and said to keep buying it, he loved it, too. Thank goodness I found it here on Amazon. Hmm... Maybe I should put it on a subscription order...
customer_reviews.author: Carol Burnside

customer_reviews.title: Price went up 35%. Won't buy anymore
customer_reviews.text: The tea is great! Price went up 35% so I won't be ordering it anymore. I'm am seeing more of this trend at Amazon very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Tea lover

customer_reviews.title: Looking for unsweetened tea!!
customer_reviews.text: I love black tea!!! And I love this brand pure leaf... I like the fact that has no sugar.. but if this is too strong for you, you can add creamer and sugar.. But I like it just the way how it’s packaged.. Nowadays we are drinking too much sugar drinks and if you are LOOKING for without sugar try this tea... but only thing is when you open the bottle just be careful because it’s topped off.. ( you getting your money worth) Try it and you will love it..
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Taste great without the calories
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea but prices keep going up up up
customer_reviews.author: S & K

customer_reviews.title: Great tea with real cherry flavor
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delicious genuine cherry flavor, in a caffeine-free light hibiscus tea. Pure Leaf did a great job with this product. Wish the price would come down on Amazon, $17 for a 12-pack is just a little higher than I’d like. Definitely my favorite caffeine-free tea though.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: King of the Leaf
customer_reviews.text: Considering that an average bottle of water costs $1, the ability to have a bottle of near-perfect unsweetened iced tea for the same price is almost unheard of in today's world. I'd rate this iced tea blend at a 95/100. It has more of a "mass produced" taste than a homemade brew, but the leaf is definitely in there. Not your typical powder potion. I've rated 63 different iced tea mixtures in my life time, so you can be certain that when you try this one you're dealing with a strong contender.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: When you're board of "Arnold Palmer" and want something different
customer_reviews.text: You can find these on sale at local store for cheaper price. However, Pure Leaf has NAILED the peach drink (my opinion). It has that hydrating-refresh quality of tea with this smooth undertone of peach. the peach is not so strong as to take the lead of the drink, the tea holds that position, and the peach is just there as support to tease the tastebuds adding to the refreshing feeling you get while drinking. yeah. good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Eli A

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor for a bottled Ice Tea
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many brands of Ice Tea over the years bottled for when I cannot brew my own. I have found this brand of unsweet tea to be one of the best for tea flavor. Most of the others seem to taste off to me I guess because of preservatives added to the tea. Sure some will disagree but for me this has been one of the best when you look at cost vs quality.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES A BAIRD

customer_reviews.title: Had a bad bottle in my pack
customer_reviews.text: I buy these often online because i find it cheaper than the store and love pure leaf raspberry tea. I drank 5 bottles before getting to one bottle that was completely fermented and had that taste when iced tea has been sitting out for a long time. Made me sick, but I did get a refund thankfully. I don’t think i will risk buying them again online but this is probably my 8th time buying it and all the other times they were perfectly fine so maybe it wasnt their fault.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: A tea drinker’s heaven
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never really enjoyed the smell or taste of coffee and as a result I’ve grown to really enjoy black tea and the caffeine it provides. Every day I brew a ton of tea at work and home but I definitely enjoy iced tea more than hot tea (I’m weird about hot beverages). This stuff is nearly as good as what I brew for myself knowing my tastes and as a result I buy it in bulk- I swear by pure leaf unsweetened as it’s got great taste and a great caffeine level.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S

customer_reviews.title: Crisp
customer_reviews.text: I do not consume any caffeine because I become extremely jittery, so whenever I come across a caffeine-free drink I give it a try. This did not disappoint. This tea is very crisp tasting. The chamomile overpowers the raspberry, which I prefer. There is just a hint of raspberry. It’s a very light drink, perfect for spring and summer nights. If you cannot consume caffeine and like tea this is the drink for you.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: I'm addicted
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a little early which made my day. It's well packaged. I've been addicted to iced tea my entire adult life & I've been drinking Pure Leaf Unsweetened Black Tea for years. This is a very good value because it's the larger size which in grocery stores is sold individually & costs more. I really like Pure Leaf's taste over other brands. I will keep buying it. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deas

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves these
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price when I bought them. $8 a case, won’t buy anymore unless the price comes down. Excellent flavor. Husband loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Cileone

customer_reviews.title: I love this tea!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would say that keeps me from making this a 5 star, is the fact that I should have considered why they were only a dollar a piece. They expire 9/28/20. While I will be drinking them all well before that. It's something to consider in the bigger picture. If you are going to drink them all quickly. You're good. If you don't.. maybe find one with more time. I work in Food manufacturing. So, this isn't really going to make me not drink them. I'm aware of how the best by etc works.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie A. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: The peach flavor is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: The peach flavor is the best out of all pure leaf teas. The only negative thing I have to say is that I feel like it should be a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: The unsweetened is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this stuff tastes so good and clean. Only 2 ingredients and 0 everything, except for 5mg of sodium. I drink this at work when I get tired of water and want a little flavor and a bit of an energy boost. Very pure taste, just like if I would've brewed black tea myself, but so much more convenient. I've reordered several times already.
customer_reviews.author: dcc

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste - Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Pure Leaf version of Green Tea. It's always just about full to the brim (where a lot of competitors have a few inches of air inside the neck of the bottle), tastes great and is very refreshing. I dig it. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Finally hibiscus
customer_reviews.text: Been waiting for this since Knudsen discontinued their hibiscus tea. Love the mango and look forward to the peach becoming available.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Haines

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I used to drink Tazo green tea but they decided to water it down, and it tastes awful now, so I looked around for a replacement, trying several different teas. This one is not as addicting, but it's pretty good. Watch out that you don't spill it, because they fill it all the way to the top. It's not sweet, not too unsweet, and has the right amount of peach flavor.
customer_reviews.author: TawnTawn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, No issues
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered the Extra Sweet Tea four times now and placing an order for two more today. I've never had an issue with them. They have not been past their expiration date; the closest date being 3 months out. The case has always been placed inside an Amazon box without any other padding or shipping materials and all cases have arrived in good condition thus far (knock on wood). The only issue I've run into I'd the fluctuating price. I will update if I run into any issues in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Watch Out For the Sugar
customer_reviews.text: These Pure Leaf Iced Teas, especially the Raspberry flavor, are FILLED with added sugars. I would recommend avoiding these types of drinks and seriously considering reducing sugar intake, for health reasons. If you are purchasing these to have 1 bottle per day, they get old really quick and your tongue's taste buds start to malfunction due to the sugar overload. I recommend coconut water instead of this, or at least buy the Pure Leaf flavors that have 20g or less sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Milan

customer_reviews.title: Low in caffeine & tasty
customer_reviews.text: I try to limit my caffeine intake for medical reasons, but sometimes need it for alertness, e.g., highway driving at night. Green tea level is sufficient and also usually my upper bound. I try even more strongly to avoid high sugar beverages. This unsweetened green tea has good flavor, with or without bit of lemon juice. Unfortunately, it comes & goes in my supermarket, so purchasing from Amazon fills that gap.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Jean

customer_reviews.title: Uncertain shelf life
customer_reviews.text: I like the tea. I am not happy about having to use so much really substantial plastic bottles. Also 2 cases received last Wednesday had a use by date of Jan 20,2020 -- so it was over 60 days past that. It better not happen again.
customer_reviews.author: SandyR

customer_reviews.title: Usually receive with no problems
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I received where one of the bottles was opened and it leaked all over the box and everything in the box. I'm not sure what happened during packaging and shipping but it was a mess. This is the first time that has happened so I didn't make a big deal or report it. I will continue to order from this seller because I usually the product is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Product was expired
customer_reviews.text: Three 12 packs were expired on 8/10/20 5 weeks before I received them - I kept them and drank them because I did not want to make a big deal but I am hesitant to buy this product again because they were expired. It did worry me that it was expired but I can't find the raspberry in the store so I kept them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BS description lies! ITS SWEETENED
customer_reviews.text: I checked and checked to make sure the product is described as unsweetened and without sugar. I have bought this in the store before and it was great. THIS IS SOOOOOO GROSS! 27 GRAMS OF SUGAR! Its awful. I am now stuck with two cases no one will drink cuz we arent gross pig poeple who want 27 grams of sugar in our liquids. Redbull, soda, all have less sugar. MAKE IT CLEAR!!! This description is a lie, do not be fooled.
customer_reviews.author: Siri

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Peach Flavor 🍑
customer_reviews.text: Delicious Peach Tea! My favorite brand is Honest Organic but it can be hard to find in stock, and this is a great substitute. Have tried a dozen different kinds and Pure Leaf & Honest are the best IMO
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: A real let down!
customer_reviews.text: Box tea came in was damaged. There was this huge red sticker on the package tea was in. At first I started not to try a bottle, anyway I took a small sip it was terrible I have never tasted anything like this "tea" also had an after taste. I will never order this stuff again I threw the entire case into the recycle bin a real waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: GIGI101

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Like "Real" Iced Tea Rather Than The Instant Stuff...
customer_reviews.text: Pure Leaf Unsweetened Iced Tea is by far the best tasting unsweetened bottled tea that I have tried. It has a freshly brewed taste rather than an instant, powdered tea taste and with two Spenda artificial sweetener packets added to the bottle...you can't beat it for a refreshing on-the-go beverage! Our family of two actually went through two 12-packs in just over a week. Glad to have discovered it and will definitely purchase again. Great price on Amazon as well!!
customer_reviews.author: WNCCaroline

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal - if you enjoy sweeter tea
customer_reviews.text: These are a no brainer with the free shipping. At other stores, the smaller bottles of 16.9oz (6 pack) runs over six dollars. A better deal and comes straight to your home. These have always arrived quickly and in perfect condition each time I have ordered. For those who have not had it previously, it is a pretty sweet tea hence the "Extra Sweet" but it is not overly sweet whatsoever. No complaints at all from this shopper.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas K.

customer_reviews.title: Excessively sweet and undrinkable
customer_reviews.text: This is UNdrinkable. There is no green tea flavor, which is obscured by an excessive amount of super sweet honey. The bottle label states that it contains 25 grams of sugar, which equals SIX teaspoons — a killer amount and extremely unhealthy. I love Pure Leaf UNsweetened green tea, which has been unavailable, the only reason I unfortunately ordered this.
customer_reviews.author: Ashcriss

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tea
customer_reviews.text: Not all tea is the same and I just prefer this one over the others. On an aside, the guy who delivered it left my two cases of this tea right in front of my front storm door, effectively keeping my elderly mother trapped in the house until I got home from work. Love the tea, hate the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: New price is ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: The new price is ridiculous, $8 to $17, come on!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting tea for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I like to drink ice tea but I need to limit myself so I prefer this size over a larger container which I drink faster. This tea has a ice authentic flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Too much sugar if you're trying to be healthy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing taste. Good product. Also a good price verses the price at the store. The only problem is if you're following the American heart association than this is absolutely too much sugar intake. 1 bottle has 46g of sugar. For women the daily intake should be 25g. For men it's 37.5g. So going by that chart alone this bottle contains more sugar in one bottle more than our intakes should be. I always assumed tea is always healthy but apparently I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amber McCoy

customer_reviews.title: 2 Sweeeet
customer_reviews.text: Some of you will get that reference. Anyway, this is the way I like my iced tea. However, for you diabetes heads, stay far away from this because it will surely make your blood sugar spike. Yikes! It's great for getting pumped for working out, though. It tastes soooo good, but drink in moderation, less you end up on dialysis.
customer_reviews.author: Luminus

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and the price (so far) is right compared to other variations of Pure Leaf. The slightly larger than normal service size is good. My only complaint (for me) is that it tends to give me heartburn I guess due to the flavoring, compared to some of the other varieties. Worth the splurge though.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory H.

customer_reviews.title: Here Is Your Best Supply Source for Leaf Tea!
customer_reviews.text: We love getting this tea delivered to our door. This is the BEST tea of its kind. We did the math and we not only don't have to be at the mercy of what Sam's Wholesale failed to order, but we save money too! Go for it, this is a great deal.GREAT item! FAST service! THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Borger

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing - taste like water!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love tea especially green tea. This product is EXTREMELY disappointing. It is SO SO diluted that it did not even taste like tea whatsoever. I might as well drink bottled water. It was a total waste of money. I will not buy it again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ada D.

customer_reviews.title: Mold or something growing in my bottles of Green Leaf Tea
customer_reviews.text: I have received around 5 shipments now of the Green Leaf Extra Sweet Tea with something growing in the bottle. The first couple of shipments with the foreign substance in it contained maybe one bottle or two so I thought they may have broken open in shipment. But the last three shipments I have received have over 40% of the bottles with the issue. Seems like there is a major quality control issue here and if you don't see it and open the bottle and drink it watch out. It is a horrible experience. Seems like a health issue as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Scott Hatton

customer_reviews.title: way too many price changes....
customer_reviews.text: Tea is great, but way too many different price changes on this... was under 8.50 not $18.00 Back to sams for me.. on this ..
customer_reviews.author: Aunt B

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping & great product .Packaged really well.
customer_reviews.text: Will buy again, we love this Tea and having it delivered so quickly to our home was a big plus especially in inclement weather., not having to get out in the pouring down rain was a blessing. I love Amazon for their fast shipping and all the items I've ordered have been exactly as I've expected & sometimes even better.
customer_reviews.author: JB Tumlin

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and good value
customer_reviews.text: I love ice tea and decided to order something different when I saw the hibiscus tea on sale. First I love the bottles and usually re-use them a couple of times and refill them with homemade tea sometimes. The hibiscus tea taste great and is not overpowering. The sweetness is just perfect and I don't need to add extra sugar. I will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Selena Hall

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The perfect summer drink though I drink it Room temperature from the bottle all Winter. I order about 2 cases of month it's wonderful
customer_reviews.author: flowerchild

customer_reviews.title: LOVE This Tea
customer_reviews.text: This is the only place I can find the Cherry-Hibiscus in a multi pack. The Cherry-Hibiscus is our favorite flavor, and it gets old paying $2 for individual bottles from the cooler in the front of the grocery store. Thanks Amazon for packaging it at a Much better price
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Price doubled
customer_reviews.text: I have regularly bought this tea but will not continue after a doubling of the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Gone in a week
customer_reviews.text: Gave my girlfriend this as a gift because this is like her drink of choice and loves it and I walked in carrying it and she screamed and was so excited so I would call it a success, there's not much to talk about with tea exempt that I don't regret this at all and I enjoy drinking this tea considering I don't even like tea
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Carriveau

customer_reviews.title: It's delicious
customer_reviews.text: Finally someone made a decaffeinated Ice Tea that you don't have to mix from a can. You can enjoy it straight out of the bottle. I've tried the Peach, the Mango and the Cherry. I like them all. Very refreshing and delicious. Thanks Pure Leaf!
customer_reviews.author: lori u

customer_reviews.title: Tea for Two
customer_reviews.text: This tea is not available in stores for me, and I love, love the flavor! What a delicious and refreshing tea for the hot summer days we've been having.!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sweetened herbal tea out there! It is lightly sweetened and has kind of complex flavor that is very refreshing. All my coworkers liked the flavors (I work in food industry)! Surprisingly good ;)
customer_reviews.author: J. Xu

product_meta.title: Pure Leaf Iced Tea, Unsweetened Black Tea, 18.5oz Bottles (12 Pack)
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:0 Sugar Unsweet

at pure leaf, we believe the best things in life are real and simple. But sometimes, simplicity takes a little more work. Before each pure leaf brew is freshly bottled and sealed, our tea leaves are given a lot of love and attention, resulting in refreshing, leaf brewed tea (not from powder or concentrate).
feature_bullets: Brewed from real tea leaves picked at their freshest, never from powder or concentrate
No artificial sweeteners or added color

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
